txt.en: 'Within the halls of Ghâr Mejet, dangerous foul creatures fill this forsaken area. These creatures pose a grave danger to anyone who inhabits Umbar-môkh. We have lost several folks who have come too close.\n\n'Can you thin the ranks of the restless Dead throughout this area?'
Talk to Yâshri and let her know that fewer of these creatures haunt this place.
Talk to Yâshri outside of Ghâr Mejet
Dangerous foul creatures fill this forsaken area. Seek out these creatures and destroy them before they can harm others.
'These creatures have taken many lives from those of us who choose to live below. Thank you for thinning the ranks of these foul things.'
Dangerous foul creatures fill this forsaken area. Seek out these creatures and destroy them before they can harm others.
